alert.note: Alert for Northern Phillips; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 26 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Central and Southeast Phillips, Northern Phillips, Petroleum and Southwest Phillips. * WHEN...Through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - More showers and thunderstorms are expected through Saturday morning. Any storms remaining over the same area for a long time may lead to flooding as they will likely contain heavy rain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
